author: Hive Bot
subject: feat(genesis): Complete Phase 4 Week 1 - Unified Infrastructure Foundation
body:
Implemented "Prep Now, Migrate Later" infrastructure for Hive platform
consolidation. Zero breaking changes - all existing agents continue working
unchanged while new unified infrastructure enables gradual migration.
